item.title: Yours truly
item.description: The name’s Sarvagya Sagar . He is a tireless seeker of knowledge, occassional purveyor of wisdom and also, coincidentally, a hacker. He enjoys never being satisfied with his programming, traveling, bhojpuri songs & movies, teaching, burger, mathematics and occasionally sketching with touch of mellow smoothness. Stab forks into your eyeballs looking at his Twitter handler to take a closer look at his work history and whatnot. Technology should work for people, not the other way around.
